name: The Lovers (Part 1)
description: The Lovers Part 1/3, From my series "Running from Something, Looking for Something". I watched them from afar, drifting in and out of each other's grasp heading towards the glacial silence. Sometimes your eyes betray what burns inside you. Shot in Iceland, 2017, on a Braun Nizo Super 8 Camera, Kodak Tri-X film stock. (https://jonathanliu.net/running/) (2000 X 1370px)
